The Sunday Riley C.E.O. 15% Vitamin C Brightening Serum is a fantastic product that can help to brighten and even out your skin tone, reduce the appearance of fine lines, and provide antioxidant protection.

**Tips for incorporating the serum into your routine:**

1. **Use it in the morning**: Apply the serum in the morning, after cleansing and toning, to help protect your skin from environmental stressors and pollution throughout the day.
2. **Mix it with your moisturizer**: You can mix a few drops of the serum with your moisturizer to help it absorb more easily and provide extra hydration.
3. **Start with a small amount**: Begin with a small amount (2-3 drops) and gradually increase as your skin becomes more tolerant.
4. **Be patient**: Vitamin C serums can take time to show results, so be patient and consistent with your skincare routine.
5. **Combine with other products**: Pair the serum with other products that contain antioxidants, like vitamin E or ferulic acid, to enhance its benefits and provide even greater protection against free radicals.

**Remember to also:**

* **Wear sunscreen daily**: Vitamin C can make your skin more sensitive to the sun, so be sure to wear a broad-spectrum sunscreen with at least SPF 30 daily.
* **Exfoliate regularly**: Exfoliating helps to remove dead skin cells and allows the serum to penetrate deeper into the skin.
* **Stay hydrated**: Drink plenty of water to help your skin look its best and to enhance the benefits of the serum.

I hope you enjoy the Sunday Riley C.E.O. 15% Vitamin C Brightening Serum and see positive results! If you have any more questions or concerns, feel free to ask.
